title: Unforgiven
description: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The Schofield Kid.

title: Reservoir Dogs
description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: Aladdin
oscars_won_details: Best Original Song (A Whole New World)
description: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: A Few Good Men
description: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

title: The Crying Game
description: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

title: Scent of a Woman
description: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

title: Glengarry Glen Ross
description: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office, where agents are compelled to sell undesirable properties to unwitting victims.

title: The Player
description: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?

title: Howards End
description: A businessman thwarts his wife's bequest of an estate to another woman, only to become romantically involved with her himself.

title: Basic Instinct
description: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

title: Batman Returns
description: Batman returns to the big screen when a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaks havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman.

title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
description: The centuries-old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

title: My Cousin Vinny
description: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama call on one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience, to defend them.

title: A League of Their Own
description: Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.

title: Malcolm X
description: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam.

title: The Last of the Mohicans
description: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

title: Wayne's World
description: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

title: Sister Act
description: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

title: The Bodyguard
description: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to an R&B singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

title: Candyman
description: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

title: Army of Darkness
description: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

title: Chaplin
description: A biography of the turbulent life of filmmaker and comedian Charlie Chaplin.

title: Hard Boiled
description: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

title: Strictly Ballroom
description: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

title: Braindead
description: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

title: Indochine
description: The story of a French rubber plantation owner in colonial Indochina and her adopted Vietnamese daughter, set against the backdrop of the rising nationalist movement.

title: El Mariachi
description: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

title: Husbands and Wives
description: When their best friends announce that they're separating, a professor and his wife discover that the faults in their own marriage are becoming harder to ignore.

title: Death Becomes Her
description: When a woman learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
description: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

title: Lethal Weapon 3
description: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue a former L.A.P.D. officer who uses his knowledge of police procedure and policies to steal and sell confiscated guns and ammunition to street gangs.

title: Alien³
description: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on a prison planet inhabited by male inmates and attempts to kill the alien that survived the crash.

title: Under Siege
description: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

title: Patriot Games
description: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

title: Sneakers
description: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

title: Singles
description: A group of twenty-something friends, most of whom live in the same apartment complex, search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.

title: Of Mice and Men
description: Two drifters, one a gentle giant and the other his guide, find work at a ranch in Depression-era California, but their plan to own their own farm faces tragedy.

title: Bob Roberts
description: A folk singer turned corrupt politician runs for the US Senate in Pennsylvania.

title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
description: A young FBI agent disappears while investigating a murder miles from Twin Peaks that may be related to the future murder of Laura Palmer; the last week of the life of Laura Palmer is chronicled.

title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
description: The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.

title: Porco Rosso
description: In 1930s Italy, a veteran World War I pilot is cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

title: Bad Lieutenant
description: While investigating the rape of a nun, a corrupt New York City police detective with a serious drug and gambling addiction tries to change his ways and find forgiveness.

title: Passion Fish
description: A soap opera star is paralyzed in an accident and returns to her home in Louisiana to recover, where she meets a nurse who changes her outlook on life.

title: One False Move
description: Three criminals on the run from Los Angeles converge on a small Arkansas town where the local sheriff is waiting for them.

title: Deep Cover
description: A police officer goes undercover to infiltrate a drug ring, but gets in over his head.

title: A River Runs Through It
description: The story of two stern but loving brothers growing up in Montana, dedicated to fly fishing.
